get.summary: Get a list of connectors
get.description: This call returns the list of connectors based on the query params.

parameters.name: online
parameters.description: Status of the connector. Online = 1, Offline = 0

parameters.name: instance_id
parameters.description: The name that was given to the connector

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Return the connector with type equal to one of the type_id in the array

parameters.name: last_seen_gte
parameters.description: Return all connectors whose last_seen is greater than or equal to provided value here

parameters.name: last_seen_lte
parameters.description: Return all connector whose last_seen is less than or equal to provided value here

delete.summary: Delete a connector given an id
delete.description: This call returns the list of connector based on the query params
